main.title: Learn To Invest In Startups Like The Best In Latam
main.subtitle: To empower both aspiring, seasoned investors and family offices with the knowledge, tools, and network needed to identify and invest in the most promising startups in Latin America.

team_section.title: Meet Our Team
team_section.subtitle: Our team consists of the top investors in Latin America, bringing a wealth of experience and a proven track record in the startup investment world

members.name: Laura Gaviria
members.description: Laura Gaviria is a co-founder of Team Faktory AI and a former executive at SoftBank. As an angel investor, she has a keen eye for emerging technologies and high-potential startups.

members.name: Laura González
members.description: Laura González serves as the Chief Business Officer for Strategic Growth. With a wealth of experience in driving business expansion, structured finance, and as a VC investor, she excels at identifying and capitalizing on growth opportunities through strategic initiatives.

members.name: Andrés Bilbao
members.description: Andrés Bilbao is a distinguished co-founder of Rappi and Makers. Renowned for his strategic vision and entrepreneurial spirit, he has also invested in some of the most successful startups in the region.

modules.title: Module 1: Intro to VC
bullets: Understanding venture capital and angel investing strategies

modules.title: Module 2: Sourcing
bullets: Learn how to gather top-quality dealflow by developing an angel brand

modules.title: Module 3: Assessing and portfolio construction
bullets: Learn how to evaluate decks and deals
Master the art of pattern recognition to select the best founders & deals
